Text.Page:
[Run with the Valsekyr Hunt]

Hungry for new challenges? You are cordially invited to exciting {@Rgn:76001$$Kanstria} to join the Valsekyr Hunt.

When you arrive, talk with {@LinkCreature:76#3001#Keinbara} to begin an exciting argon-stalking adventure.

A pleasure, !

You're a growing legend around these parts. Akasha? Thulsa? Kelsaik? Impressive.

I've never brought down a god, but the Hunt stalks the toughest gameâ€”argons. We help the war, raise morale, and add to our own glory. Sound fun to you?
